name: GitHub Actions: OWASP ZAP Baseline
description: Run ZAP baseline DAST scan against a URL.

files.template:
name: ZAP Baseline

on: [workflow_dispatch]

jobs:
  zap:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: ZAP Baseline Scan
        uses: zaproxy/action-baseline@v0.12.0
        with:
          target: '{{target_url}}'
          cmd_options: '-a'
